commit.message:
auto merge of #12090 : bjz/rust/unimplemented, r=cmr

Adds a standardised placeholder for marking unfinished code.

files.patch:

+// error-pattern:not yet implemented
+fn main() { unimplemented!() }

+fn main() { unreachable!() }
